attributes.action: Reduce council tax in line with cuts to services for the public
attributes.background: Why should we be paying more and more council tax when all they do is keep cutting and withdrawing servicesx what are we paying for! In Somerset virtually all rural roads now don't get gritted, they're not maintaining the roads, the binmen strewn waste all over the place! Yet taxes still rise!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's about something the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors.
